about_the_game:
Welcome to Trivia Crack World, the first immersive trivia experience available everywhere! Connect with people from all over the world, compete in multiplatform multiplayer matches, and explore a 3D park on your mobile, desktop, or VR device to quench your thirst for knowledge!

Trivia Crack World offers a wide range of categories, with thousands of questions in each one. Thanks to multiplatform support, you can play mini games, discover new facts, explore an immersive 3D world of knowledge and enjoy the thrill of competition no matter where you play!

Key Features of Trivia Crack World:

- Multiplatform Support: Play on mobile, VR, or desktop, offering flexible ways to enjoy the game.
- Park Exploration: Discover Willy Street, a 3D virtual park filled with challenges and learning opportunities.
- Solo Mode: Not feeling like playing with other people? Don't worry! You can play single player matches.
- Mini Games: Play fun and engaging trivia 3D mini games.
- Knowledge Expansion: Learn new facts and trivia in various categories.
- Worldwide Multiplatform Multiplayer Matches: Compete with friends or players from across the globe.
- Rewards and Achievements: Unlock rewards and achievements as you progress through the mini games.
- Global Community: Join a multiplatform community of trivia enthusiasts and make new friends.


With Trivia Crack World, you can challenge yourself, meet new people, and have a great time. Download Trivia Crack World now and join the first immersive trivia experience available everywhere!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest Pro, Meta Quest 3, SteamVR
